meanings.definition: Not charming; lacking charm or attractiveness.
meanings.sent1: The old, uncharming house sat quietly on the street.
meanings.sent2: She found the uncharming painting to be quite dull.
meanings.sent3: The uncharming cat tried to act cute but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: His uncharming behavior cast a shadow over the party.
meanings.sent5: The uncharming garden was devoid of any beauty or color.

meanings.definition: Not pleasant or appealing in manner or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The uncharming smell coming from the kitchen made her lose her appetite.
meanings.sent2: The uncharming weather ruined their plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: His uncharming jokes always fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The uncharming news spread quickly through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The uncharming sight of the abandoned building sent shivers down her spine.
